# HMError.Code.bridgedAccessoryNotReachable

**Case**

An error indicating the bridged accessory cannot be reached.

## Declaration

```swift
case bridgedAccessoryNotReachable
```

## Bridge errors

- **HMError.Code.cannotRemoveNonBridgeAccessory**: An attempt to remove a bridged accessory.
- **HMError.Code.cannotUnblockNonBridgeAccessory**: An error indicating a non-bridge accessory cannot be unblocked.

items.description: An attempt to remove a bridged accessory.
items.name: HMError.Code.cannotRemoveNonBridgeAccessory

items.description: An error indicating a non-bridge accessory cannot be unblocked.
